001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004import java.util.function.Function;
005import java.util.function.Supplier;
006
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.Builder;
008
009public class CombinationQueryPredicate<T> implements QueryPredicate, Builder<QueryPredicate> {
010    private final QueryPredicate predicate;
011
012    private final Supplier<T> modelSupplier;
013
014    public CombinationQueryPredicate(final QueryPredicate predicate, final Supplier<T> modelSupplier) {
015        this.predicate = predicate;
016        this.modelSupplier = modelSupplier;
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * combines the previous predicate with the argument predicate by an AND operator
021     * @param fn predicate builder function
022     * @return a combination predicate
023     */
024    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> and(final Function<T, CombinationQueryPredicate<T>> fn) {
025        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
026            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(fn.apply(modelSupplier.get())).operator("and"),
027            modelSupplier);
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * combines the previous predicate with the argument predicate by an AND operator
032     * @param second predicate
033     * @return a combination predicate
034     */
035    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> and(final CombinationQueryPredicate<T> second) {
036        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(second).operator("and"),
037            modelSupplier);
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * combines the previous predicate with the argument predicate by an OR operator
042     * @param fn predicate builder function
043     * @return a combination predicate
044     */
045    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> or(final Function<T, CombinationQueryPredicate<T>> fn) {
046        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
047            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(fn.apply(modelSupplier.get())).operator("or"),
048            modelSupplier);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * combines the previous predicate with the argument predicate by an OR operator
053     * @param second predicate
054     * @return a combination predicate
055     */
056    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> or(final CombinationQueryPredicate<T> second) {
057        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(second).operator("or"),
058            modelSupplier);
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * puts the resulting predicate in parentheses
063     * @return a combination predicate
064     */
065    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> group() {
066        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(ContainerQueryPredicate.of().inner(predicate), modelSupplier);
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * negates the previous predicate with the NOT predicate
071     * @return a combination predicate
072     */
073    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> not() {
074        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
075            ContainerQueryPredicate.of().parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("not")).inner(predicate),
076            modelSupplier);
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public String render() {
081        return predicate.render();
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public QueryPredicate build() {
086        return predicate;
087    }
088}
